name: Frozen Drift Race
description:
Frozen Drift Race is a 3D racing game full of fun and healthy competition.
Develop your skills in driving sport cars on a one of five winter routes. Take up the challenges and earn drift points to unlock new levels.
Exchange money gained in races for the new cars.
Gain experience and become the king of heavy snow drift under harsh snowy weather conditions.

For everyone:
- Five sports cars
- Five winter trucks
- 3 game modes
- Physics bringing the joy of driving
- A lot of fun and a healthy competition
